price: 19. Mpe Allah ayebi maye bozali kobomba na maye bozali komonisa polele.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُسِرُّونَ وَمَا تُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā tusirrūna wamā tuʿ'linūna
